meanings: (사람·나라 등을) turn one's back on, (배반하다) betray
walk the way the wind is blowing
walk with the wind at one's back
with one´s back to the audience
sit with one´s back against the wall
stand with one's back toward the wall

vlive.korean: [후광을 등지고 6위 등장] 여기인가? 뭐야 이게? [Team at 6th place] Is this the one? What's this? 듣기 View video 내 전공은 힙합(My major is HIPHOP) : Ep 17. 2라운드 진출 전! 갑분 멤버 교체 위기? 새롭게 영입된 멤버는 누구?
vlive.english: [Team at 6th place] Is this the one? What's this?

vlive.korean: [나 김댕댕 세상을 등지고 잔다] 어떡해! [I'm Kim Puppy. I will do anything if I can sleep tight] Oh, my! 듣기 View video V PICK! : [1년 전 오늘의 Stray Kids] 난 고래야 고래서 밀레니엄즈를 좋아해❤️ (Stray Kids’s Millennium line a year ago)
vlive.english: [I'm Kim Puppy. I will do anything if I can sleep tight] Oh, my!

vlive.korean: 등지고 하잖아. We have our backs to the camera. 듣기 View video V Beauty : [연선 Yeonsun] 더유닛 효선 아이돌에게 배워보는 걸크러쉬 메이크업 The Unit Hyosun Girl Crush Make-up
vlive.english: We have our backs to the camera.

vlive.korean: [등지고 있던 에릭이 못 봄] 안 내면 진 거 가위바위보! [Eric didn't see him because he was turned back] Rock-paper-scissors. 듣기 View video THE BOYZ : [THE100] 나만 아니면 돼ㅐㅐㅐ!! 뫼비우스 게임의 결말은? - EP 19
vlive.english: [Eric didn't see him because he was turned back] Rock-paper-scissors.

vlive.korean: 등지고 좋아요. Turning your back. Good. 듣기 View video 스누퍼(SNUPER) : [C.A]스누퍼와 이천수가 함께하는 아육대 준비 시간
